title: ACNBP Common Definitions
description: Common data structures referenced by ACNBP message schemas.

Skill.title: Skill
Skill.description: A basic, atomic unit of workload or functionality that realizes a part of a capability, as defined in ACNBP.

skillId.description: A unique identifier for the skill within the provider's context (e.g., 'translate_paragraph_EN_to_JP', 'validate_HIPAA_compliance_for_data_X').

description.description: A human-readable description of the skill.

parametersSchema.description: Optional: A JSON schema describing the input parameters required by this skill.

outputSchema.description: Optional: A JSON schema describing the output produced by this skill.

dependencies.description: Optional: List of other skill IDs this skill depends on.

metrics.description: Optional: Performance metrics or typical characteristics of this skill (e.g., average processing time, accuracy).

SkillSet.title: SkillSet
SkillSet.description: A collection of specific skills required to perform a task under a given capability.

Costs.title: Costs
Costs.description: Defines the cost structure for the offered skills or capability.

currency.description: The currency code (e.g., USD, EUR) as per ISO 4217.

perUnitCost.description: Cost per defined unit (e.g., per page, per API call, per hour).

unitDescription.description: Description of the unit for perUnitCost (e.g., 'page', 'API call', 'hour', 'token').

fixedCost.description: A fixed cost for the service, regardless of usage.

upToQuantity.description: Upper limit of quantity for this tier. Can be null for the last tier.

pricePerUnit.description: Price per unit within this tier.

additionalDetails.description: Any other relevant cost information or URL to detailed pricing.

QoS.title: QualityOfService
QoS.description: Defines the Quality of Service parameters.

throughput.description: Rate of processing or data transfer.

turnaroundTime.description: Guaranteed or typical turnaround time for a defined task.

errorRate.description: Typical or maximum error rate as a percentage.

scalability.description: Description of scalability characteristics (e.g., 'auto-scales up to X concurrent requests').

ComplianceAttestation.title: ComplianceAttestation
ComplianceAttestation.description: An attestation of compliance with a specific standard or regulation.

attestationDate.description: Date of the attestation or certification.

expiryDate.description: Optional: Expiry date of the attestation.

attestationDocumentUrl.description: Optional: URL to the certificate or attestation document.

attestingBody.description: Optional: The organization that provided the attestation.

SecurityFeature.title: SecurityFeature
SecurityFeature.description: A specific security feature offered by the agent or its service.

featureName.description: Name of the security feature (e.g., 'End-to-End Encryption', 'Data-at-Rest Encryption', 'MFA Support').

algorithm.description: Optional: Specific algorithm used if applicable (e.g., 'AES-256', 'RSA-4096').
